mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "The Square Dance Picture", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Square Dance Vacations 1962", "Who, Me?", "Americana: Turkey in the Straw", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Vox Saltator: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "Gym Floors - Care and Use", "The Most Critical Fifteen Minutes of a Square Dance", "Overseas Dateline", "List of Old Favorites now on 45 R.P.M.", "Style Series: Cast Off", "Ladies on the Square: Things to Do with Skirts", "Style Series: Square Mixers", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "Flashes from Miami Beach", "Caller of the Month: Al "Tex" Brownlee", "Paging the Roundancers: Wayne and Norma Wylie", and "Experimental Lab: Wheel-Cross".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
